full_summary:
### Firearms Buyback Program - Invitation to Qualify

**Reference Number:** PW-XYZ-002-29229
**Publication Date:** December 7, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** January 29, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
**Amendment Number:** 10
**Solicitation Number:** 0D160-241493/A

**Request for Information:**

This is an Invitation to Qualify (ITQ) to procure services for the Firearms Buyback Program on behalf of Public Safety Canada. Suppliers are invited to pre-qualify to become "Qualified Respondents" for the later phases of the procurement process.

**Project Overview:**

The Firearms Buyback Program aims to remove prohibited firearms from circulation by offering fair compensation to businesses and individuals impacted by the prohibition. The estimated volume of affected firearms is between 10,000 to 15,000 for businesses and 125,000 to 200,000 for individuals.

**Trade Agreement:**

This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP).

**Tendering Procedures:**

All interested suppliers may submit a bid. The Competitive Procurement Strategy is Best Overall Proposal.

**Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement:**

This procurement is not subject to provisions of Comprehensive Land Claim Agreements.

**Legitimate Objectives (LO):**

Some aspects of this ITQ and any resulting solicitation or contract are subject to provisions of Legitimate Objectives. These measures allow for a competitive process that will offer best value to the Crown and to Canadians, while providing the required security protections.

**Contact Information:**

For all enquiries and other communications related to this notice, please submit in writing to the attention of the Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) Contracting Authority at:
spac.papraf-apfcp.pspc@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Delivery Date:**

The delivery date is specified above.

**Regions of Delivery:**

Services will be required across Canada, including New Brunswick, Nunavut Territory, Alberta, Newfoundland and Labrador, Quebec, Prince Edward Island, British Columbia, Northwest Territories, Ontario, Nova Scotia, Saskatchewan, Manitoba, Yukon, and the National Capital Region.

**Notice Documents:**

The Notice Documents, including the Invitation to Qualify (ITQ), may be downloaded from the Canada Buys website at [url removed].
